TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted: The cost of pentaborane+fluorine is now one billion dollars per millilitre.

I wish for comprehension before comment.

Granted.
pre-hension.com ment.com

 

I wish DOS 6.22 was the last DOS.

Granted: it is the lost DOS.

I wish to swing from the chandelier.

Granted, but the chandelier breaks and you fall.

i wish to put the new Forgis on the jeep

Granted: You put a forge on the jeep and now the jeep is squashed.

I wish a 6 wheel drive.

Granted. You catch a roach and attach six wheels to it legs.

I wish for a flying bike.

Granted: It flys away before you can catch it.

I wish for an orange lime.

Granted.
orange = rgb(255,165,0)
lime = rgb(50,205,50)
average = rgb(152,185,25) = https://www.color-hex.com/color/98b919

I wish for expanded RGB.

Granted: Romeo Golf Bravo

I wish all the best to the troll.

Granted. Everybody in the trolleybus thanks you.

I wish for a trolleyball championship.

Granted: You get a group of people all hiding behind their own screens, constantly screaming abuse while never listening to anybody else.

I wish for a magical place.

Granted.  You are transported instantaneously to the Harry Houdini museum.  It is closed currently, and so you are arrested for trespassing and breaking and entering.

I wish magic wasn't so hard to perform.

Granted: it is easy to perform once you have studied it daily for 30 years.

I wish a book of knowledge.

Granted. You know every ledge around from the book.

I wish for a Grimmoire.

Granted: It is so depressed that it throws itself off a bridge.

I wish for a Joymoire.

It explodes from pure joy, spreading the happiness to you and exploding you as well.

I wish i could go to other solar systems at will.

Granted. You cannot tell which solar system you are traveling to and you cannot bring any life support.

I wish for control of the KSP IP.

Granted. Now you are responisible for the KSP-2 financial problems.

I wish for KSP for ZX Spectrum.

Granted: It takes a month to load and refreshes at 1 frame per hour.

I wish for one rule to ring them all.

Granted. Your one ring gives you the exclusive rights to own and use the words "them" and "all". In order to prevent other people from using these words that they do not have the right to use, you are notified by all existing means of contact every single time someone else uses one of these words.

I wish for Ship 29 to be recovered and put in a museum.

Granted in its turn, after the Ships ## 0, 1, 2, ..., 28 and the extraordinary ones.

I wish people were more attentive when reading spells.

10 hours ago, ColdJ said:

I wish for one rule to ring them all.

2 hours ago, Aviator01 said:

Your one ring gives you the exclusive rights

The wish was about "rule to ring", not about "ring to rule".

2 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

The wish was about "rule to ring", not about "ring to rule".

I misread that.

6 hours ago, Aviator01 said:

I misread that.

A typical beginning of a magic quest in fantasy.

Granted: But you get that spell system where you have to move the mouse in a precise but different way for each type of spell, that is almost impossible to get right in the heat of the moment.

(Know I have played it but can't remember the games name.)

I wish I could remember.

Granted, you now have (24) hours before you contract stage 7 alzheimers.

I wish making planets in KSP was easier.
